title: @BroPoro
body:
Alright so, I've already made a support ticket about a digital rp card that I bought from amazon by Riot Games. The purchase went through and I received my code but when I went on league to redeem it, the code didn't seem to work. This message pops up https://gyazo.com/8295aa9021b3bcda5095faff92e7c997?token=8c31e05c88141d14c34df32c537d3b40 and I went on support.riotgames to find any information I could but that message wasn't there. I really need help before the sales run out. 
If anymore information is need, I can hopefully provide.

replies.body: i know this might seem like a negative comment and doesnt help your issue, but why buy a giftcard instead of flat RP?

So I'm a child and I don't have full permission to buy whatever I want.
My mother told me to order things online for my sisters and I asked if I could add a giftcard for league.
I could've asked her to type her card information in but that would take much time.

Oh gosh thats a bummer eh? Since you've already got a ticket submitted, our billing team will be able to get that taken care of shortly. Make sure to shoot them  a picture of the code so that they can get it fixed asap ^_^!
